divs: Sighting Detailswas located 3460 hurly street phila.pa. during ww2 was comon tosee spotlights fropm groud ,always had alight beem from the ground up airplane or on the clouds . these three discs of light did not,that is why i thought they were a new type of antiaircraft search light.
Summary: was young,wwtwo was over thought the three discs of light were a new antiaircraft search light since there was not a colum of light going up to disc as a usual searchlight has.this also seen by my bruther ray,who later told me thestory. several neighbors
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around November 30th 1947
